data.name: Lone Star Patio North Texas
data.address: 6080 S Hulen St suite 360-225, Fort Worth, TX 76132

reviews.text: 6080 S Hulen St suite 360-225, Fort Worth, TX 76132 🦃 Happy Thanksgiving from Lone Star Patio North Texas! 🦃 This Thanksgiving, we’re grateful for our wonderful customers and the communities across North Texas who trust us to create beautiful and functional outdoor spaces. From all of us at Lone Star Patio, we hope your holiday is filled with good food, laughter, and quality time with family and friends. Thank you for letting us serve you! #Thanksgiving #NorthTexas #Gratitude #LoneStarPatio
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"They have great customer service, stand behind their work and locally owned." "If you need your patio redone, I highly recommend Lone Star Patio North Texas!" "His pricing was very competitive with other quotes."

Josh and his crew did an absolutely fantastic job on our screened in patio. Not only was the work great, but Josh was always super responsive and helpful through the whole process from the first consultation through the final walkthrough. If you need your patio redone, I highly recommend Lone Star Patio North Texas!

Josh and his crew did an excellent job understanding exactly what we wanted, planning it, and executing it.  We are thrilled with how our cabana/pergola and outdoor kitchen remodel turned out.  Josh is professional, well skilled, reliable, very friendly, and is a great communicator.  You can't go wrong with Lone Star Patio North Texas. More

We had a great experience with Lone Star Patio! Josh, Cohl, and their entire team were amazing to work with from start to finish. They were always responsive when we had a question, and showed up when they said they would. We love our new patio and will absolutely call them again next time we have a project. 5 stars! More
